backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing content items with admin-gated CRUD operations and status flags using authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend Firebase and login-flow changes with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables and applying base background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.authz.tsx with critical dark background CSS to prevent white flash on load.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with guarded routes, layout wrapper, and admin seeding on app mount.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterMod: Modal component handling user registration with form validation, submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/content/AdminCon: Admin form for adding content via uploads, Drive links, or live embeds with validation and progress tracking.
Displays a list of content items with type info, status toggling, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/content/DriveVid: Embeds a Google Drive video or shows an error with a fallback link if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/content/LiveEmbe: Previews live-embed URLs with iframe error handling and a fallback open-in-new-tab option.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Them: Diagnostic banner that checks CSS, theme variables, and background when enabled via query param.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card component with optional hover animations and configurable classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with background, optional navbar, session-based visibility, and diagnostics banner.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedR: Simple wrapper adding a fade‑in animation to routed content.
frontend/src/components/motion/BabyComed: Animated visual component showing playful baby-themed graphics for the login screen.
frontend/src/components/nav/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navbar that shows links based on user access and handles navigation, dropdowns, and logout.
frontend/src/components/PremiumCard.tsx: Premium glass card with icon, animated hover effects, optional description, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/routing/AdminRou: Route guard that only renders children for admin users and redirects others to home.
frontend/src/components/routing/Protecte: Auth-protected route wrapper that redirects unauthenticated users to login and logs page visits.
frontend/src/components/routing/SectionR: Route guard that checks authentication and page-level access, with admins bypassing restrictions.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Status badge showing approved or pending state with distinct colors and animations.
frontend/src/firebase.ts: Contains Firebase project config and placeholder exports since Firebase SDK isn't installed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthzState.tsx: In-memory authorization context storing role, allowed pages, and helpers for access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating content items using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Compatibility wrapper mapping authz state to a legacy session format.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom theme variables, animations, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.authz.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query, identity, and auth providers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React and wraps it in query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing users, permissions, and content analytics with editing and saving flows.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing user info and navigation cards based on session permissions.
frontend/src/pages/IntelusPage.tsx: Displays filtered Intelus content including videos and documents using animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Shows embedded live content items or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles email/password login, authorization checks, analytics recording, and redirect logic.
frontend/src/pages/MyFilesPage.tsx: Lists document items with metadata and provides an option to open each file.
frontend/src/pages/MyVideosPage.tsx: Displays a user’s video library by filtering content items for videos and rendering embeds or file players.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a portfolio page with a fullscreen iframe embedded inside an animated layout.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Immediately redirects to the login page while preserving any return-to parameters.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders a static grid of YouTube video embeds using predefined IDs.
frontend/src/utils/accessApprovals.ts: Empty utility file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: LocalStorage-based analytics tracker for logins, page visits, and real‑time update subscriptions.
frontend/src/utils/auth.ts: Handles user registration, logout placeholder, and basic admin approval and permission updates using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contentLibrary.ts: Empty utility file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates video and document files against size and type limits and provides file size formatting.
frontend/src/utils/firestoreUserManageme: LocalStorage-backed mock Firestore utilities for fetching users and updating approvals and permissions.
frontend/src/utils/googleDriveEmbed.ts: Parses Google Drive URLs and converts them into embeddable preview links.
frontend/src/utils/motion.ts: Defines shared animation duration constants and CSS animation class names for UI motion.
frontend/src/utils/returnTo.ts: Manages saving, restoring, and building return-to navigation paths for authentication redirects.
frontend/src/utils/seed.ts: Seeds a default admin user into localStorage if one does not exist.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: LocalStorage-based user store providing CRUD utilities and deprecated session management placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and extended theme settings for the project's design system.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, env variable injection, aliasing, build options, and a dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, architectural requirements, known issues, and configuration notes for Firebase-based auth and Firestore-driven authorization.
